topic.title: I made a simple zerosite where you can publish magnetlinks, descriptions are parsed from the magnet url
topic.body:
to use put a magnet link in the text box after logging in. links are shared with everyone and ordered by last first. my first project i did in like an hour, bear with me i don't know html that well.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1omkDtXPXekU2EtyMgcqFUAqMVgnv1VDN/

feedback is appreciated.

1550942196_1JCz84LSFfgNaSG8UTX3e4UP61yYS.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_553_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): IDK if you'll get much feedback. People are content with minimalist torrent indexes like yours.

more a proof of concept then anything. i'd like to add more meta-data to the links. thanks for the comment.

> [klu9](#comment_64_131Seivv6aH8vnohPmYPcPwPfZ1a5ubMMs): I tried it out with a magnet URI, but all that happened was a new bullet point was created, with no title or anything, even after reloading the page.The magnet was: (truncated)

It's since been updated. thanks for the bug report. it was a issue with &amp code in the submitted link.
